about_the_game:
Be a legendary Samurai!
Pick up a Naviros Samurai Pack to be a legendary samurai with beautifully made and handsome clothing. This pack includes costumes, dyes and bonus coins.
The package will be delivered to the mail box of the first character you log into after you make your purchase.

Pack Contents

x1 Avatar Set Exchange Ticket - Use this special ticket to exchange with special Avatar set!
-Warrior Avatar Random Box contains Warrior Samurai Avatar Set
-Knight Avatar Random Box contains Hunter Samurai Avatar Set
-Hunter Avatar Random Box contains Knight Samurai Avatar Set
-Mage Avatar Random Box contains Mage Samurai Avatar Set
-Thief Avatar Random Box contains Thief Samurai Avatar Set
*Avatar set for each class can be received from NPC, Alonzo.

x2 Premium Avatar Dye [Top-class]
x1 Premium Weapon Dye [Top-class]
x12 Coins

* All items are bounded in an account except Coins
* Coins are tradable!

name: Naviros Samurai Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 3
  • Processor: Intel Premium 4 2.42 GHz / AMD XP 2600+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce FX 5700 / ATI Radeon 9600 PRO (128MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
